price: 5. Hebeltoh ummattay finqi teetik edde yan waktik taakumeeh wadirrowta matan.
arabic: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wamā yastakhirūna
